name: Traverse (Moonlit Lobster)
description:
Use arrow keys or WASD to move

Hold down shift to pick up objects

Your goal is to find all of the samples on the planet and bring them back to the AI console

Start by talking to the AI

Credits

Tileset from KarlisZabers

Background from Kayillustrations

Sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Music generated by MuseNet
